statements: SELECT * FROM GenomeAnnotations;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, annotation_description FROM GenomeAnnotations;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, start_position FROM GenomeAnnotations ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM GenomeAnnotations WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT gene_name, annotation_description FROM GenomeAnnotations WHERE start_position < 10000;
SELECT * FROM GenomeAnnotations ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome FROM GenomeAnnotations WHERE start_position > 1000 AND end_position < 5000;
SELECT * FROM GenomeAnnotations WHERE chromosome = 'Chr1' AND annotation_description LIKE '%regulatory%';
SELECT annotation_id, gene_name, start_position, end_position FROM GenomeAnnotations WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1' ORDER BY start_position ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS annotation_count, chromosome FROM GenomeAnnotations GROUP BY chromosome HAVING annotation_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM GenomeAnnotations;
SELECT annotation_id, annotation_description FROM GenomeAnnotations WHERE genome_sequence IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Metadata WHERE study_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT metadata_id, created_date FROM Metadata ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT annotation_id, genome_sequence, annotation_description FROM GenomeAnnotations WHERE annotation_description LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM GenomeAnnotations ORDER BY annotation_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT genome_sequence, annotation_description FROM GenomeAnnotations WHERE annotation_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT annotation_id, genome_sequence AS sequence, annotation_description AS description FROM GenomeAnnotations WHERE genome_sequence LIKE '%ATG%'
SELECT * FROM Metadata JOIN GenomeAnnotations ON Metadata.study_id = GenomeAnnotations.annotation_id
SELECT * FROM Metadata WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Annotations;
SELECT gene_name, chrom_num, start_position FROM Annotations;
SELECT annotation_text, gene_name, chrom_num FROM Annotations WHERE chrom_num = 10;
SELECT * FROM Samples WHERE collection_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT study_name, study_description, principal_investigator FROM Studies;
SELECT * FROM Annotations WHERE chrom_num = 1;
SELECT gene_name, annotation_text FROM Annotations WHERE start_position > 1000 ORDER BY end_position DESC;
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM Studies WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Samples WHERE collection_date >= '2021-06-01' AND sample_type = 'RNA';
SELECT annotation_id, gene_name, chrom_num, start_position, end_position FROM Annotations WHERE gene_name LIKE '%TP53%';
SELECT * FROM GenomeAnnotations ORDER BY annotation DESC
SELECT genome_id, contributor_name FROM GenomeAnnotations WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM Metadata WHERE genome_id = 1
SELECT collaborator_name FROM Collaborators WHERE collaborator_id = 3
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM ResearchProjects
SELECT * FROM GenomeAnnotations WHERE genome_id = 1;
SELECT annotation, contributor_name FROM GenomeAnnotations WHERE submission_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT genome_id, data_type, data_value FROM Metadata WHERE data_type = 'Genetic';
SELECT * FROM Collaborators ORDER BY collaborator_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM ResearchProjects WHERE project_name LIKE '%genomics%';
SELECT * FROM genome_annotations;
SELECT annotation, genome_id FROM genome_annotations WHERE genome_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_collaboration WHERE research_area='Biology';
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM researchers WHERE affiliation='University';
SELECT * FROM genome_annotations;
SELECT annotation, genome_id FROM genome_annotations WHERE genome_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, email, affiliation FROM researchers WHERE affiliation LIKE '%University%';
SELECT * FROM metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT project_name, research_area FROM research_collaboration WHERE collaboration_status = 'active';
